column5: Let's try going as high up as we can.
For your own sake, you should stop being
so reckless and learn to recognize the
Even so... I will protect Creha!
Like I could ever stand by and
let you guys take her away!!
all well and good, then. I'm not
here to take her against her will.
The duty that we must accomplish.
And the people who took everything from us...
What the hell did you do to Creha!?
I'm going to go with him.
After all, you can do no more.
